name: CozmoX AI
headline: Middle East and Africa's First Voice AI Employee Platform
description:
CozmoX provides AI employees powered by advanced voice technology that enables natural, human-like conversations. These digital workers communicate fluently with customers and stakeholders while handling repetitive tasks 24/7. Through our no-code platform, businesses can deploy AI employees that manage entire processes through voice interactions, replacing multiple software tools with unified solutions.

We’ve unveiled 3 powerful AI employees, with more to come:

Liza (Sales Executive) - Engages in natural voice conversations throughout the sales cycle, from initial prospect calls to negotiations and closure. She handles qualification calls, follow-ups, and maintains CRM records while building rapport through intelligent dialogue.

Alex (Debt Collector) - Conducts professional voice communications for collections, speaking with customers to arrange payments, negotiate plans, and ensure timely follow-ups while maintaining regulatory compliance.

Zara (Receptionist) - Masters voice-based front-office management, engaging in natural conversations to route calls, schedule appointments, take detailed messages, and resolve customer inquiries with a friendly, professional tone.

Like the industrial revolution transformed farming, we're revolutionizing workplace communication. By automating routine conversations and tasks, human teams can focus on creativity, problem-solving, and business growth.

We're the first in the Middle East and Africa to offer this kind of technology, but we work with businesses all over the world. We're backed by Y Combinator, Goodwater Capital, Dubai Future District Fund, Rebel Fund, and Trampoline Venture Partners, and have raised $3M in our latest round.

founders.name: Alok Kumar, Founder
founders.description: Alok is a second-time founder and was a management consultant in Saudi Arabia where he worked closely with key governmental entities responsible for increasing the financial inclusion in the economy. He had also previously cofounded a tech startup in Saudi Arabia where he was leading the tech development. Alok was born and raised as a teenager in Saudi Arabia.

founders.name: Nuha Hashem, Founder
founders.description: Nuha is an Electrical Engineer and a passionate iOS developer. Prior to Zywa, Nuha was pursuing her PhD in the US, and decided to drop out and move to Dubai to lead the tech team in Zywa. Nuha is originally from Egypt and grew up in Saudi Arabia as a teenager.

generated_description:
**CozmoX AI: Revolutionizing Business Communication in the Middle East and Africa**

CozmoX AI, founded in 2024 and based in Abu Dhabi, UAE, is tackling the workplace communication landscape with the first voice AI employee platform aimed at the Middle East and Africa. They’re transforming how businesses interact with customers by deploying AI “employees” that manage conversations and repetitive tasks around the clock—think of it as your 24/7 workforce that never sleeps, eats, or takes holidays.

This startup has launched three AI personalities—Liza (Sales Executive), Alex (Debt Collector), and Zara (Receptionist)—each designed to perform key roles traditionally held by humans. Liza expertly navigates the sales cycle, engaging potential clients and managing CRM records; Alex handles debt collection with professional finesse; and Zara manages front-office duties, from routing calls to keeping track of appointments.

So, what’s the big deal? Well, these AI employees are not just glorified chatbots. They're backed by sophisticated voice technology that enables them to conduct natural, human-like conversations. For companies, this means less time dealing with mundane tasks and more energy focused on innovation and customer engagement.

CozmoX AI operates through a no-code platform, enhancing accessibility for businesses without requiring extensive technical know-how. Their AI solutions can replace multiple software tools, simplifying operations and potentially saving millions in labor costs. By just hiring one AI worker, businesses can achieve the output of ten human employees, significantly boosting efficiency without expanding headcount.

Their technology isn’t just a novelty—it's designed to learn and adapt. Each interaction helps the AI become smarter, providing increasingly contextual and relevant responses over time, which is essential for modern customer service dynamics.

CozmoX AI has gained traction in the startup ecosystem, having secured $3 million in funding from notable investors, including Y Combinator and other venture funds. This not only lays a solid financial foundation but also hints at the faith investors have in CozmoX's vision to reshape business communications.

In essence, CozmoX AI is making strides in unifying workplace functions, reducing costs, and enhancing communication. If you’re curious about their offerings, you can check out their website [CozmoX AI](https://www.cozmox.ai/) to explore how these AI employees can be tailored for virtually any industry scenario, from customer care to order management and beyond.
